name: Components Direct
tag_list: micrel, marvell, xilinx, nvidia, maxim, obsolete-electronic-components, authorized-distributor, semiconductors, eol, excess-inventory, , connectors, circuit-protection, discretes, interface, linear, logic, wireless, memory, sensors, processors, power-mana
overview: Components Direct is the premier factory-authorized source for excess and end-of-life semiconductor components. As an extension of the manufacturer, Components Direct guarantees 100% direct manufacturer traceability on all parts. Since 2006, the company has partnered with leading manufacturer suppliers to sell factory authorized parts globally to mission-critical industries such as aerospace, defense, high tech and consumer electronics. Components Direct is a member of the Electronic Components Industry Association (ECIA) and is ISO 9001:2008, 14001:2004, ESD 20.20, and IEC 61340-5-1 certified, meeting the most stringent requirements for secure, controlled distribution. For more information, please visit www.componentsdirect.com

milestones.source_description: Components Direct Leads Industry with 100% Guaranteed Traceable Semiconductor Components
